title: Dad Kills 11-Year-Old Son, Self in New Jersey Home: Officials
content:
Shutterstock
A 48-year-old man shot and killed his 11-year-old son in their New Jersey home before taking his own life, officials say.
Police making a welfare check at the Jerusalem Road home where Jens Elberling lived with his son found the bodies Saturday; prosecutors say the two had been dead since late last week.
A rifle prosecutors say was used in the murder-suicide was recovered from the home.
"This was an unthinkable tragedy that cut short a young life," Acting Prosecutor of Union County Grace Park said in a statement. "We want to extend our deepest sympathies to the family at this time."
Prosecutors say the boy was homeschooled.
Copyright Associated Press
